msg: ASF Bugzilla Bug 2640 / Jira STR-286: do not autopopulate an action form corresponding to chained action.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o using plexus-utils which we already have in the core so that we don't need another 200k for two methods
o put the ftp and dav providers in as test scope so that all the tests pass but they don't wind up in the base
maven distribution. this will screw people usings extensions and we are trying to move in the other direction of not having
to provide anything and have the container pick things up dynamically but for now we'll keep the basic providers that we
have in previous versions of maven
